Michael Gove criticised the current guidelines on history teaching for failing to include key figures from British history. No Churchill, no Elizabeth II , no Gladstone, no Disraeli, no Florence Nightingale, no Horatio Nelson, he wrote. Bay 38. The buzz in the stadium was palpable. Here it was, the come-from-behind drive that longtime franchise quarterback Donovan McNabb had failed to produce so many times.
